table.name: vtiger_personalarea
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_personalarea` ( `personalareaid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `userid` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `subject` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`personalareaid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_personalareacf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_personalareacf` ( `personalareaid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`personalareaid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
